title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Strategies for Utilizing Print vs. Digital Books in Hybrid Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and established reading habits
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the physical and functional characteristics of print and digital books
Learners can establish criteria for selecting reading media aligned with their learning styles and objectives
Learners can design and execute strategies for integrating both media in hybrid learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
